data.name: Sex in the Office
data.detailed_description:
Boss! Boss! We need your help!

Our building full of sexy girls were turned into demons/monsters!
But more importantly, we must recover our daily production. Please give them what they want!

Only you can do that.



* Gameplay *
- An action open world game.
- Face a lot of girls who will convince you to have sex with them.
- A list of tasks to get photos and fill the gallery.
- Challenges that will prove if you are worthy to lead this company.

* Contents *
- Hours of action and challenges.
- Animated scenes in beautiful Pixel Art.
- Gallery full of beautiful devils.
- Zone bosses with a classic difficulty.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 Series or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains depictions of graphic sex, in pixel art form. Monsters in the game are capable of non consensual sex with player-controlled protagonist and his enemies.

Themes in this game include:

> Risque outfits, sexual comments and lewd situations
> Full female and male nudity
> Strong language, alcohol and drug use (fantasy products)
> Fantasy sexual situations with exaggerated characters
>Various non-consensual situations featuring humans and monsters
> Mild violence
